import{configureStore,createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';// Create a slice with initial state and reducers
const counterSlice=createSlice({name:'counter',initialState:{value:0},reducers:{increment:state=>{state.value+=1;},decrement:state=>{state.value-=1;}}});export const{increment,decrement}=counterSlice.actions;export const store=configureStore({reducer:{counter:counterSlice.reducer}});
